title: Out with Demons! In with Fortune!
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>It seems like you had quite a lot of fun this Setsubun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Huh, what are you talking about!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I heard you all played tag today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>H-how’d you know that...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Honoka-san called me earlier and told me about it. Since it’s Setsubun today, she said that instead of the usual running session, you all played tag instead. That sounds quite interesting.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ugh, why’d Honoka have to make me wear that oni mask...? Everyone staring at me was so embarrassing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Hmhm, we did something similar as well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Getting so excited for things like this is so childish.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Oh my, I’ve received a message from Nico-san... I wonder what she sent.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>From Nico-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, it looks like a picture... Oh my, how interesting...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>...What’s that look supposed to mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Oh, nothing. Hmhmhm...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Just what kind of picture did Nico-chan send you!? Show me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I think I’ll keep that a secret, hmhm~...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
